app.name: RevoKart Dumper
app.long_description: This application dumps the "auto-add library" needed for wbz/wlz/wu8 decoding and encoding directly from the Mario Kart Wii disc. Based on Reggie! Dumper by AerialX and megazig. The dumped files are stored in sd:/rk_dumper/auto-add and sd:/rk_dumper/auto-add.arc as an archive.
